RecipeDef.label: force incubate Bursters
RecipeDef.description: Forcibly implant an entire canister of plague inducing mechanites into the target, empowered by a component. This will kill them in a generally horrific and swift fashion, spawning several allied Bursters when the target expires. Good for "conscripting" defenses in a pinch, or for gathering more Mechanite Canisters.\n\nJust... probably don't use this on your own pawns, okay?
